name: Super Crusher Fighters
description:
EMULATOR CONTROLS:

A = X, B = Z, START = ENTER, keypad = D-pad

Well well well... Here we are again for my fifth 48-hour NES game!

Time flies so fast... This one's certainly not the worst I've made IMO

Made for Ludum Dare 50!

HOW TO PLAY:

  Either on this very page, a NES emulator (MESEN is included in the package), or real hardware with a flashcart

STORY:

  The Evil Dr.Schmutzengrueber is at it again! He's invented a crusher device

and is testing it on innocents! Only you can sto... Erm delay (stay with the theme...)

his dastardly plans!

CONTROLS:

  ARROW KEYS: Move your character around

  A: Jump

  B: Get into PLACING MODE

PLACING MODE:

  When in PLACING MODE, you can place Crates or Super Crates next to you.

When you activate this mode with B, the crates you have left will be displayed

on the screen. Lo lay a crate, select the direction your want to place it, and,

crate ahoy!

TIPS:

  All of the levels are clearable. Some solutions require thinking outside the box :)

  The cats need a fully open opening to escape from pens

  Try mastering switching modes

CREDITS:

 Game entirely made by Antoine Fantys, 2022
